summary: Adds various clothing with bonus to existing skills such as speech, blacksmithing and alchemy.
descriptionHtml:
A very simple mod that does two things:

1.
Adds clothing that, while worn, temporarily increase certain skills such as blacksmithing, speech and alchemy in order
to make regular clothes a bit more useful and more immersive.
Now you can switch to blacksmithing clothes when smithing or dress in fine clothes to increase your overall charisma.
The clothes can be found on several merchants around skyrim.

2.
Adds a unique clothing set that increases speech. The set constist of a hat, a robe and a pair of boots along with matching jewelry.

Lore:
The Fashionable Attire; once created by a famous court tailor from Solitude was so desirable that it became a target for power hungry politicians, wizards,
thieves and greedy merchants.
Over time each piece of the set was lost and scattered across Skyrim along with the knowledge of it's true potencial and influencial powers.

Installation:
Just put "The Fashionable Attire.esp" in your skyrim/data directory.
Or..
Download with manager should you use nexus mod manager.

Uninstall:
Just delete "The Fashionable Attire.esp" from your skyrim/data directory.

Compatibility:
This mod should be compatible with anything.
The mod simply adds new clothing with skill bonuses rather than editing all existing clothes in order to reduce
potential conflicts to a minimum.

Feel free to use/change or get inspired by this mod in any way possible.
You do not have to ask for our "permission" or something (ridicilous) to use this.

(Please pardon the terrible picture. Our skills in paint increased by 1. It is now 1... Yes... Really...)
author: Azomandran and Cheekan
